text:
vai sa#muqdrastasyaiqtat pAqraM ~Myada#tirAqtrau ya EqvaM ~MviqdvAsa#H saM~Mvathsaqra-mu#paqyantyanA$rtA EqvOdRuca#M gacCantIqyaM ~Mvai pUrvO#&tirAqtrO# &sAvutta#rOq manaqH pUrvOq vAgutta#raH prAqNaH pUrvO#&pAqna utta#raH praqrOdha#naqM pUrva# uqdaya#naqmutta#rOq jyOti#ShTOmO vaiSvAnaqrO# &tirAqtrO Ba#vatiq jyOti#rEqva puqrastA$ddadhatE suvaqrgasya# lOqkasyA-nu#KyAtyai caturviq(gm)qSaH prA#yaqNIyO# Bavatiq catu#rvi(gm)Sati-
rad^^rdhamAqsAH - [  ] 3
